response.overview: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.

production_companies.name: Motion Picture Production GmbH & Co. Erste KG

response.tagline: 400 U.S paratroopers. 4,000 Vietnamese soldiers. 12,000 miles away from home. 1 man led them into battle.
response.title: We Were Soldiers

titles.title: Am fost cîndva soldati... si tineri

cast.name: Phong Atwood Vo
cast.character: North Vietnamese Soldier - South Vietnamese and Villager (voice) (uncredited)
